name: The Seeker
description: Welcome to the Seeker! Run, hide and hack in this indie top-down game that gives a whole new meaning to the word "random!" Explore a virtually infinite number of levels as you avoid dangerous turrets, enemies and alarms. Find the exit to destroy the AI and avenge all of humanity!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or up Processor: Inter Core II Duo + or Amd Athlon 64 x2 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GT 440 or ATI 5670 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or up Processor: IntelÂ® Core i7-3820 or AMD FX 8320E Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 660+ or ATI Radeon HD 7870+ DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: For SSR and other Post Process effects, graphic card is required to have 1gb VRAM
